name: Chicken Parmigiana
instructions: In small pan dissolve cornstarch in tomatoes.
Cook, stirring constantly until thickened, keep hot.
Pound chicken to 1/4‚Äù thick, dip into crumbs coating well.
Fry in oil 3-4 min. on each side.
Place cheese on each piece of chicken.
Cover and cook until chicken is done and cheese is melted.
